cause.description:
Well this is the B.o.H.(Bag over head) foundation. For all the ugly people out there we provide paper bags(brown or white) and for those that are tired of living we provide plastic wal-mart bags. Some people are too ugly so we will prove 2 bags for you to put over your head and a tic tac cause damn some people breath be stinkin like hell.
1. We help ugly people out!
2. Provide bags for their heads.
3. Make sure they get what they need.
cause.mission: Provide ugly people with what they need.
cause.name: B.o.H. Foundation.
